attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to remove the National Football Museum from the town of Preston and move it to Wembley, where it belongs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The National Football Museum must be forced to move from the town of Preston to London.

The museum has been based in Preston since 2001 where it has done nothing but waste public money  because nobody visits it.

With the 2018 bid underway it is about time the museum and its relics were moved to Wembley, the true centre of football in the UK.
